name: Pixel Farmer (BenB)
description:
Hello guys,

If you want a relaxing break from the stress daily life causes you, this game is perfect for you. You play as a farmer that plants crops through a console interface. It is your goal to plant crops and to keep the farming gods at bay, otherwise, you will have to face the consequences. 

This project was made in a few days and could definitely use some tweaks and balancing. Let me know what you think!
